alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 2:09PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Showers producing small hail will impact portions of northern Alameda and Contra Costa Counties through 245 PM PDT... At 208 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers producing small hail along a line extending from near Brentwood to Hercules. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, Antioch, Livermore, San Ramon, Walnut Creek, Pittsburg, Danville, Martinez, Oakley, Pleasant Hill, San Pablo, Lafayette, El Cerrito, Brentwood, Hercules, Albany and Pinole. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
